fields.description:
Steps To Reproduce:
1. Run Drillbit
2. Run network.httpclient test on iOS

Actual Result:
      clearCookiePositiveTest_as_async  	false		Timed out waiting for HTTP onload
      clearCookieUnaffectedCheck_as_async	false		Timed out waiting for HTTP onload

Expected Result:
Should pass
fields.summary: iOS: network.httpclient drillbit test case fails
fields.environment: Mac 10.6.8 with SDK version=1.7.4 timestamp=10/25/11 09:53 githash=f8f612b

comments.body: Resolving as "Won't Fix" as we no longer support Drillbit.
